name: T - Noelle Mia
_source: speak;Mia; Holy smokes{tgm}...{tgm}{w} That's one hell of a wyvern you've got there.
speak;Noelle; Hm? Oh, you mean Grace?{w} Yeah, she's the best wyvern in the whole world.
speak;Mia; A spectacular beast, I say{tgm}...{tgm}{w} I've had wyvern on a stick before, but no living one's let me get this close{tgm}...
speak;Noelle; On second thought, maybe step away, if you don't mind{tgm}...
